name: Moelis & Company
description: Moelis & Company is a leading global independent investment bank that provides financial advisory services to clients across various industries. Founded in 2007 by Ken Moelis, the firm has established itself as a trusted advisor for mergers and acquisitions (M&A), capital markets, restructuring, and other financial transactions. With a commitment to delivering unconflicted advice, Moelis & Company operates without proprietary trading or lending, allowing it to focus solely on the best interests of its clients. The firm has built a strong presence in both domestic and international markets, advising corporations, financial sponsors, and governments on complex financial matters. Moelis & Company prides itself on its culture of collaboration, deep industry expertise, and innovative solutions tailored to meet the needs of its clients. The firm's dedication to excellence and integrity has earned it a reputation as one of the premier advisory firms in the investment banking sector. As it continues to grow and expand its global reach, Moelis & Company remains focused on providing unparalleled service and strategic insights to help clients navigate the ever-changing financial landscape.
